summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests and supporting utilities for validating a remote procedure call (RPC) system in a distributed environment. It includes lightweight request and response classes with serialization capabilities, helpers to launch RPC servers and clients, and a collection of test scenarios covering multiâ€‘client connections, multithreaded calls, timeout handling, and message serialization.
business_intent: To verify that the RPC infrastructure used in distributed graph processing works correctly under various conditions such as concurrent clients, threading, and timeouts, ensuring reliable communication and data exchange across processes.
